question: In which country, "Kyrenia Mountains" is located?
explanation: Kyrenia Mountains is a long narrow mountain range located in the northern part of Cyprus. This mountain, also known as Pentadaktylos, is made of limestones and marbles. The highest peak of this range is Mount Kyaparissovouno. It is the only other mountain range in Cyprus after Troodos Mountains. A controversial flag of unrecognised Northern Cyprus is painted on the southern slope of the mountains.
